application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 4 (Cycle Storage Details) and Condition 5 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission 24/00258/FUL.
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient and unacceptable information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 4 (Cycle Storage Details) of planning permission 24/00258/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted unacceptable information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 5 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission 24/00258/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure proper waste management in the interests of the character and appearance of the area and the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
